## BoundingBox class

The bounding box class

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class BoundingBox extends AABB implements BoundingVolume 
```
**Extends:** [AABB](doc/markdown/./base.aabb.md)

**Implements:** [BoundingVolume](doc/markdown/./scene.boundingvolume.md)
